Name: Cola de Mono
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
30 ml De Kuyper Cr√®me de Cafe
Instructions: MUDDLE cinnamon stick and pisco in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Review: Coffee and cinnamon - a drink to be savoured after diner.
History: Created by yours truly and based on a Chilean drink traditionally consumed at Christmas, the name of which literally translates as 'Tail of Monkey'. The original uses milk and sugar instead of coffee liqueur.
